title: The Witch Nichang - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Martial Arts   Romance   Slice of Life   Wuxia   Yuri
tags: Abandoned Children   Absent Parents   Adopted Children   Age Progression   Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Couple Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Fanfiction   Hard-Working Protagonist   Selfless Protagonist   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Transmigration   Unconditional Love
author: 八千岁
description:
What is fate?

Destined? Providence? Irreversible?

I don’t understand.

I only know that I can’t bear to see your hair turn white before your time, a sword to end a love that has yet to begin.>
